attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: A truly terrible experience. This app was aggressive in its verbiage and asked for my phone number, so so very inappropriate!! ✨✨

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: Please do not download, it has biased news and I should have listened to the rating. 1.2 stars??? DONT DOWNLOAD. But if you do, please rate it.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I opened this app and immediately got aids.  10/10 do not recommend.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 😡
attributes.review: Not only did it take HOURS to download, but it also made my phone some much slower. It also makes my phone hot 😤. WORST APP EVER.

attributes.title: AWFUL DO NOT PURCHASE
attributes.review: This app has caused me hell from the second I downloaded it. IT STEALS YOUR DATA OFF YOUR PHONE!!!! Trump needs serious help if he thinks it’s ok to have this.

attributes.title: Made my phone overheat
